Yes!! I try it creating jobs, some using PersistStoreProcess and some 
using  PersistLogStore. I use the same state directory in initial crawl 
and the second crawl.

After hours crawling I get 28 altert message as

com.sleepycat.util.RuntimeExceptionWrapper: (JE 3.2.23) Can't open a 
cursor Database state can't be DbState.CLOSED must be DbState.OPEN
